Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.name: insertedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.abstract: Returns a Set of object IDs that were inserted into the context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.name: updatedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.abstract: Returns a Set of object IDs that were updated.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.name: deletedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.abstract: Returns a Setof object IDs that were marked for deletion during the previous event.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.name: refreshedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.abstract: A Set of objects that were refreshed but were not dirtied in the scope of this context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.name: invalidatedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidMergeChan.abstract: A Set of object IDs that were invalidated.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: insertedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Set of object IDs that were inserted into the context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: updatedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Set of object IDs that were updated.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: deletedObjectIDs
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Setof object IDs that were marked for deletion during the previous event.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.name: insertedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.abstract: Returns a Set of objects that were inserted into the context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.name: updatedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.abstract: Returns a Set of objects that were updated.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.name: deletedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.abstract: Returns a Setof objects that were marked for deletion during the previous event.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.name: refreshedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.abstract: A Set of objects that were refreshed but were not dirtied in the scope of this context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.name: invalidatedAllObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextObjectsDidCh.abstract: When all the object in the context have been invalidated, returns a Set containing all the invalidated objects’ NSManagedObjectID.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: insertedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Set of objects that were inserted into the context.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: updatedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Set of objects that were updated.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: deletedObjects
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: Returns a Setof objects that were marked for deletion during the previous event.

Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.name: queryGenerationToken
Structs/ManagedObjectContextDidSaveObjec.abstract: The new NSQueryGenerationToken associated to the save operation.

Structs/CoreDataMigration.html#/s:12Core.name: migrateStore(at:targetVersion:enableWALCheckpoint:progress:)
Structs/CoreDataMigration.html#/s:12Core.abstract: Migrates a store to a given version.

Structs/CoreDataMigration.html#/s:12Core.name: migrateStore(from:to:targetVersion:deleteSource:enableWALCheckpoint:progress:)
Structs/CoreDataMigration.html#/s:12Core.abstract: Migrates a store to a given version if needed.

Structs/CoreDataMigration/Step.html.name: Step
Structs/CoreDataMigration/Step.html.abstract: Represents a single step during the migration process.

Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.name: numberOfObjects
Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.abstract: The number of objects belonging to the section.

Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.name: objects
Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.abstract: Array of objects belonging to the section.

Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.name: indexTitle
Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.abstract: The string used as an index title of the section.

Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.name: init(_:)
Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html#/.abstract: Create a new element of FetchedResultsSectionInfo for a given NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo object.

Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html.name: FetchedResultsSectionInfo
Structs/FetchedResultsSectionInfo.html.abstract: Section info used during the notification of a section being inserted or deleted.

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: Searches for the first CoreDataModelVersion whose model is compatible with the persistent store metedata

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.name: init(persistentStoreURL:)
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: Initializes a CoreDataModelVersion from a NSPersistentStore URL; returns nil if a CoreDataModelVersion hasn’t been correctly defined.

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.name: migrationSteps(to:)
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a list of MigrationStep needed to mirate to the next version of the store.

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.name: mappingModelToNextModelVersion()
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a NSMappingModel that specifies how to map a model to the next version model.

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.name: inferredMappingModelToNextModelVersion()
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a newly created mapping model that will migrate data from the source to the destination model.

Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html.name: CoreDataModelVersion
Protocols/CoreDataModelVersion.html.abstract: Types adopting the CoreDataModelVersion protocol can be used to describe a Core Data Model and its versioning.

Functions.html#/s:12CoreDataPlus20isMigr.name: isMigrationNecessary(for:to:)
Functions.html#/s:12CoreDataPlus20isMigr.abstract: Returns true if a migration to a given CoreDataModelVersion is necessary for the persistent store at a given URL.

Extensions/NSSet.html#/s:So5NSSetC12Core.name: deleteManagedObjects()
Extensions/NSSet.html#/s:So5NSSetC12Core.abstract: Specifies that all the NSManagedObject objects (with a NSManangedObjectContext) should be removed from its persistent store when changes are committed.

Extensions/NSSet.html#/s:So5NSSetC12Core.name: materializeManagedObjectFaults()
Extensions/NSSet.html#/s:So5NSSetC12Core.abstract: Materializes all the faulted objects in one batch, executing a single fetch request.

Extensions/NSPersistentStoreCoordinator..name: destroyStore(at:)
Extensions/NSPersistentStoreCoordinator..abstract: Safely deletes a store at a given url.

Extensions/NSPersistentStoreCoordinator..name: replaceStore(at:withStoreAt:)
Extensions/NSPersistentStoreCoordinator..abstract: Replaces the destination persistent store with the source store.

Extensions/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequ.name: historyTransactionFetchRequest(with:where:)
Extensions/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequ.abstract: Creates a NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest to query the Transaction entity.

Extensions/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequ.name: historyChangeFetchRequest(with:where:)
Extensions/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequ.abstract: Creates a NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest to query the Change entity.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: historyTransactions(using:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns all the history transactions (anche their associated changes) given a NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest request.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: historyChanges(using:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns all the history changes given a NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest request.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: mergeTransactions(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Merges all the changes contained in the given list of NSPersistentHistoryTransaction.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory()
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory(before:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given date.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory(before:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given token.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory(before:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given transaction.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: persistentStores
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: The persistent stores associated with the receiver (if any).

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: metaData(for:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns a dictionary that contains the metadata currently stored or to-be-stored in a given persistent store.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: setMetaDataObject(_:with:for:completion:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Adds an object to the store’s metadata and saves it asynchronously.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: entity(forEntityName:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns the entity with the specified name (if any) from the managed object model associated with the specified managed object context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: fetchNSArray(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns an array of objects that meet the criteria specified by a given fetch request.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: newBackgroundContext(asChildContext:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns a new background NSManagedObjectContext.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: changesCount
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns the number of uncommitted changes (transient changes are included).

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: hasPersistentChanges
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Checks whether there are actually changes that will change the persistent store.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: persistentChangesCount
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns the number of changes that will change the persistent store (transient changes are ignored).

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performSave(after:completion:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Asynchronously performs changes and then saves them.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performSaveAndWait(after:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs changes and then saves them: if the changes fail throwing an execption, the context will be reset.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: saveOrRollBack()
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Saves the NSManagedObjectContext if changes are present or rollbacks if any error occurs.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWaitResult(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs a given block on the context’s queue and returns the final result.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWait(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs a given block on the context’s queue.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performMergeChanges(from:completion:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Asynchronously merges the changes specified in a given payload.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWaitMergeChanges(from:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously merges the changes specified in a given payload.

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: changedValue(forKey:)
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Returns the value of a persistent property that has been changed since last fetching or saving operation.

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: committedValue(forKey:)
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Returns of the last fetched or saved value of the propery specified by the given key.

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: refresh(mergeChanges:)
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: If flag is true (default), the object won’t turn into a fault; instead, it’ll update its unchanged properties from the row cache, preserving any unsaved changes;

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: delete()
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Specifies an object that should be removed from its persistent store when changes are committed.

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: obtainPermanentID()
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Converts the object ID to a permanent ID (if the object doesn’t already have a permanent ID)

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: entityName
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: The entity name.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: newFetchRequest()
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Creates a new NSFetchRequest for self.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: existingObject(with:in:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: <div class="aside aside-important">

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetch(in:with:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Performs a configurable fetch request in a context.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetchNSArray(in:with:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Performs a configurable fetch request in a context.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetchObjectIDs(in:includingSubentities:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Fetches all the NSManagedObjectID for a given predicate.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetchOne(in:where:includesPendingChanges:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Fetches an object matching the given predicate.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: findOneOrCreate(in:where:with:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Attempts to find an object matching a predicate or creates a new one and configures it (if multiple objects are found, configures the first one).

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: materializedObjectOrFetch(in:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Tries to find the first existing object in the context (memory) matching a predicate.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: findUniqueOrCreate(in:where:with:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Attempts to find an unique object matching a predicate or creates a new one and configures it;

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetchUnique(in:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a fetch request where at most a single object is expected as result; if more than one object are fetched, a fatal error will occour.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: delete(in:includingSubentities:where:limit:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the objects (matching a given predicate) that should be removed from its persistent store when changes are committed.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: delete(in:except:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Removes all entities from within the specified NSManagedObjectContext excluding a given list of entities.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: count(in:for:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Counts the results of a configurable fetch request in a context.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: materializedObject(in:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Iterates over the context’s registeredObjects set (which contains all managed objects the context currently knows about) until it finds one that is not a fault matching for a given predicate.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: materializedObjects(in:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Iterates over the context’s registeredObjects set (which contains all managed objects the context currently knows about) until it finds

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: batchUpdate(using:resultType:propertiesToUpdate:includesSubentities:predicate:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch update on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: batchDelete(using:resultType:configuration:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch delete on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: batchInsert(using:resultType:objects:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch insert on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: batchInsert(using:resultType:dictionaryHandler:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch insert on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: batchInsert(using:resultType:managedObjectHandler:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch insert on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: fetchAsync(in:estimatedResultCount:with:completion:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Performs a configurable asynchronous fetch request in a context.

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: safeAccess(_:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Performs the given block in the right thread for the NSManagedObject‘s managedObjectContext.

Extensions/NSBatchUpdateResult.html#/s:S.name: changes
Extensions/NSBatchUpdateResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns a dictionary containig all the updated NSManagedObjectID instances ready to be passed to NSManagedObjectContext.mergeChanges(fromRemoteContextSave:into:).

Extensions/NSBatchUpdateResult.html#/s:S.name: status
Extensions/NSBatchUpdateResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns true if the batch update operation has been completed successfully.

Extensions/NSBatchInsertResult.html#/s:S.name: changes
Extensions/NSBatchInsertResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns a dictionary containig all the inserted NSManagedObjectID instances ready to be passed to NSManagedObjectContext.mergeChanges(fromRemoteContextSave:into:).

Extensions/NSBatchInsertResult.html#/s:S.name: status
Extensions/NSBatchInsertResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns true if the batch insert operation has been completed successfully.

Extensions/NSBatchDeleteResult.html#/s:S.name: changes
Extensions/NSBatchDeleteResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns a dictionary containig all the deleted NSManagedObjectID instances ready to be passed to NSManagedObjectContext.mergeChanges(fromRemoteContextSave:into:).

Extensions/NSBatchDeleteResult.html#/s:S.name: status
Extensions/NSBatchDeleteResult.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns true if the batc delete operation has been completed successfully.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.name: deleteManagedObjects()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.abstract: Specifies that all the NSManagedObject objects (with a NSManangedObjectContext) should be removed from its persistent store when changes are committed.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.name: materializeFaults()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.abstract: Materializes all the faulted objects in one batch, executing a single fetch request.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.name: entities()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12CoreDa.abstract: Returns all the different NSEntityDescription defined in the collection.

Enums/FetchedResultsObjectChange.html.name: FetchedResultsObjectChange
Enums/FetchedResultsObjectChange.html.abstract: An enum representing the four types of object changes a FetchedResultsController can notify.

Enums/FetchedResultsSectionChange.html.name: FetchedResultsSectionChange
Enums/FetchedResultsSectionChange.html.abstract: An enum representing the two type of section changes a NSFetchedResultsController can notify.

Classes/Transformer.html#/s:12CoreDataPl.name: transformerName
Classes/Transformer.html#/s:12CoreDataPl.abstract: The name of the transformer. It’s used when registering the transformer using Transformer.register().

Classes/DataTransformer.html#/s:12CoreDa.name: transformerName
Classes/DataTransformer.html#/s:12CoreDa.abstract: The name of the transformer. It’s used when registering the transformer using DataTransformer.register(transform:reverseTransform:).

Classes/DataTransformer.html#/s:12CoreDa.name: register(transform:reverseTransform:)
Classes/DataTransformer.html#/s:12CoreDa.abstract: Creates and registers an instance of a DataTransformer.

Classes/DataTransformer.html.name: DataTransformer
Classes/DataTransformer.html.abstract: A generic ValueTransformer subclass to implement CoreData Transformable attributes.

Classes/Transformer.html.name: Transformer
Classes/Transformer.html.abstract: A generic NSSecureUnarchiveFromDataTransformer subclass to implement CoreData Transformable attributes.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
